@henriettamross Hoping you don't .. if ya know what I mean.. love talking with you too, night night H X
@henriettamross hahaha big time H.. Printers always seem to malfunction.. I'm no big fan, needy! ;) and hungry..
@henriettamross haha.. nothing wrong with a smidgen of malicious intent! Just tape printers peeps shut H ;)
@henriettamross haha... there was lots of emotion in that phrase! I enjoyed the shredder catharsis.. ''twas a struggle ;)
@henriettamross love being able to enjoy the writing, absolutely feels freer..
@henriettamross totally agree H.. waay too much baggage involved with 1st.. a cathartic shredder struggle ! ;) 2nd book really different..
@henriettamross Good on the sending out, all takes time.. though think you're right on the catharsis..2nd book I'm enjoying the writing more
@henriettamross editing last ..quite? Also last chapter had a... shredder accident! ðŸ˜¬
@henriettamross Great that it's going well! I'm like that, once it's done you moved on.. I'm all caught up in new book, and not finished..
@henriettamross Ha..to Nico.. no doubt, we're so forgetful we misplaced all our furz! ðŸ˜¬
@henriettamross How has your writing been H ?
@henriettamross off on.. stop start.. restless and agitated, hollow ground but then have beautiful days when it flows.. enjoying when I can
@henriettamross Not good when you're not sleeping H,been me too. I can underwhelm Nico.. mere blinky human! ;) But it is! Writing has been..
@henriettamross not been best day.. been little on the overwhelmed. But okay H, you?
@henriettamross Absolutely H,all realities are true.. subjective at best.With you &many on the struggle.. internal/external all our reality
@henriettamross Have to find a copy of that! On the cyclists thing.. that at least would be.. entertaining! ;)
@henriettamross get a proper job haha.. covers it well H.. trick cyclists, as my Dad used to call them! ;) Agreed on the read..
@henriettamross Ah... reading R D at the moment.actually patiently-ish waiting for that film! most have a very limited medical model H..
@henriettamross exactly.. they do.. neurologists/ neurosurgeons.. not a blinky.. not a huge fan of psychiatric field.. mostly
@henriettamross yeah.. much of function of brain we still don't understand..
@henriettamross book I've finished and editing is pretty relative to the subject.. unconscious mind can be tuned in on many levels.. to me
@henriettamross I mostly fluctuate between extremely weird/dark &bad nightmares.when I sleep ;) I'm pretty sure night can be day & day night
@henriettamross complex mostly.. variable in origin and necessity in relation to emotions etc.. multi levelled.Long history re. me of weird.
